data.title: internal pentest (black/grey/white box)
data.description: assessment of corporate network security from inside
data.fullDescription: assessment of corporate network security from inside. we use different access models: from no data to providing accounts and network diagrams. we check escalation paths, privileges, configuration security, and network segmentation

data.title: external pentest
data.description: analysis of the company's perimeter from the internet side
data.fullDescription: analysis of the company's perimeter from the internet side. searching for vulnerabilities in services, open ports, web interfaces, and access gateways. risk assessment of unauthorized external intrusion

data.title: OSINT
data.description: collection and analysis of information from open sources
data.fullDescription: collection and analysis of information from open sources: corporate leaks, open configurations, DNS, employee mentions, internal documents, passwords, etc. used as part of attack preparation

data.title: employee training in attack countermeasures
data.description: conducting practical training sessions for IT, SOC, and cybersecurity teams
data.fullDescription: conducting practical training sessions for IT, SOC, and cybersecurity teams on recognizing hacking techniques, incident response, and protection against targeted attacks. presenting real cybersecurity attack cases

data.title: phishing and social engineering employee testing
data.description: simulation of phishing campaigns and social engineering scenarios
data.fullDescription: simulation of phishing campaigns and social engineering scenarios to assess staff resilience. sending email messages and influencing employees with subsequent analysis and training

data.title: Wi-Fi security testing
data.fullDescription: analysis of wireless network security. WiFi is one of the easiest ways to penetrate the company's internal network

data.title: web application pentest
data.description: testing web applications and APIs for vulnerabilities
data.fullDescription: testing web applications and APIs for vulnerabilities: XSS, SQLi, CSRF, RCE, CMDI, XXE, IDOR, SSRF, and others. includes manual and automated analysis

info.subtitle:
â€” a team of specialists and researchers focused on
practical information security

data.text:
our comprehensive penetration testing services allow you to be confident that
IT infrastructure and data are protected from unauthorized access, and
protect yourself from financial, business, and reputational risks

we are a group of experts in digital system protection.
specialize in technical vulnerability analysis, corporate infrastructure resilience testing, and cybersecurity project support

unlike companies focused on formal reports, we
work directly with client teams, delving into details and promptly
responding to real risks

data.title: goal
data.text: to provide organizations with stable digital asset protection, minimizing threats and increasing business resilience to cyber incidents

data.title: prospects
data.text: we strive to become a key technical partner in information security for companies valuing expertise, technology, and integrity

data.title: principles
data.text: we build our work on five main principles: professionalism, openness, efficiency, innovation, and growth aspiration. these form the foundation of our approach

data.title: victories and prizes at international CTF tournaments
data.text: our specialists have won prizes at international cybersecurity competitions, including Standoff

data.title: specialist certification
data.text: the team includes professionals with international certifications, including OSCP, OSEP, OSWE, and others

data.title: accredited company
data.text: the company is state-accredited in the IT field

data.title: think like hackers
data.text: we use modern security assessment techniques: from threat modeling and manual configuration analysis to simulating real attacker actions. we apply Red Team principles and current frameworks and proprietary products

data.title: open to experience exchange
data.text: upon request, we conduct in-person or online sessions for client IT and cybersecurity specialists. we show how to find and fix critical errors that may lead to infrastructure compromise

data.title: ensure an individual approach
data.text: we do not work by templates. we consider the technical landscape and internal processes, discuss individual conditions, and select a work format for specific tasks

about.title: DATAELI team
about.preinfo:
the key feature of our company is specialists with real
practical experience in cybersecurity
about.postinfo:
we constantly learn, share knowledge, and hone our skills to
stay at the forefront of digital security

data.text: pentesters with experience in government and private companies
experts in code analysis and vulnerability discovery
secure solution architects and DevSecOps engineers

prepare.title: agree on goals
prepare.subtitle:
discuss the specifics 
of your situation and define upcoming tasks

prepare.title: jointly develop technical specification
prepare.subtitle:
define the list of information assets for security assessment
define allowed techniques, tactics, and approaches to security assessment
formulate requirements and obligations of the parties
document the agreed terms

prepare.title: start security assessment
prepare.subtitle: act according to the agreed technical specification

result.title: based on the results of the activities, provide two reports
result.notes1_2:
containing
a detailed description of the activities performed, identified deficiencies
and recommendations for their elimination
result.notes2_3: containing key conclusions and results of the security assessment activities
